body.name: 2500W High Pressure Steam Cleaner, Hand-Held Portable Steam Cleaning Machine 6 Gears Adjustable with 6 Brush Heads,for Home Use Grout Tile Car Detailing Kitchen Bathroom,with Cleaning kit Tool,White

features: 【2500W High-pressure Steamer】Rapidly heating up within 10 seconds, the temperature can reach 221°F/105°C and the steam pressure reaches 3 Bar.strong steam power for deep and effective cleaning,effectively remove stubborn greasy dirt and stains.

【6 Adjustable Speeds&6 Different Brush Heads】It can adjust different intensities to handle various cleaning tasks, equipped with three different brush heads and an 8.7inch extension rod, providing the best cleaning effect.

【Protable Steam Cleaner】 Adopting a handheld design, compact size, and easy to carry,the hose is 87 inches long, which is long enough for us to clean easily.Perfect for mobile cleaning without making you feel tired.

【Large Capacity Water Tank】Can be used continuously for up to 1 hour without frequent replenishment, improving your cleaning efficiency, while providing you with gloves, towels, and aprons, offering considerate safety performance and comfort, and enjoying the cleaning experience brought by the steam cleaner.

【Widely Used】Widely used in kitchen, bathroom, and living room, such as cleaning range hood, stove, refrigerator, bathtub, interior decoration, grouting, tiles, windows, sofa, flooring, carpets, washing machine, refrigerator, mud, and tiles.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: CKductpro Handheld Pressurized Steam Cleaner- Lightweight,Portable and with an Extra Long Power Cord Portable handle and lightweight size make the steamer easy to carry only by one hand.The tank supports adding water during working, so that the steamer can keep working for longer washing time.

Warm Tips： If want to remove the grease add detergent please.Avoid burned of the nozzle wear gloves please .No trigger on handbar, turn off the power switch if need to stop the steam please.Sometimes steam tube loose during delivery , connect it again before use please.Sometimes nozzle loosed or dripped after long time use, change the rubber ring please which included in the accessories
Power Source: Electric Power（W）: 2500W Capacity: 1000ML Steam Pressure: 3 BAR Power Cord Length: 2.5M Steam Hose Length: 2.2M Machine Size: 190X150X130mm Weight: 1.9KG

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not a toy.
reviews.reviewText: Safety First; Remember, you are dealing with extremely hot steam. Please keep children and pets out of the area while using. This is very easy to set up and use. You basically just add water and turn on. You have an extension wand and 2 sets of 3 different brush heads you can use. ( small brass, and large and small nylon bristles.) They also throw in some replacement gaskets for the wand. Bonus items include a small swatch of cloth, which I just use to wipe off the machine with. A small pair of gardening gloves, which I can't use because they're too small, but might fit someone. And a nylon apron to protect your cloths. I wear old cloths when I clean, so i'll probably get more use of that when I'm in the kitchen. I'm not complaining - I think it's nice they included some bonus items. There is a dial on the top to adjust how much steam is spraying. The base holds plenty of water. I have yet to run out during a job, but I tend to tackle one main job at a time. Pro tip; use distilled water to eliminate, or at least drastically reduce, any scaling build up. I have a Zero Water pitcher for drinking water that I use and haven't had any plugging/build up yet. If you do, just mix water and vinegar and use for a while to clean out the internals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for those hard to clean areas
reviews.reviewText: I have not fully explored all the places I can use this handheld steamshot cleaner. I got this mostly to use around the toilet because I have a house full of boys! It works fine for that job. Now I just need to find other out of the box places to use this cleaner. I think I will try it on the grill when the weather breaks maybe even on the pool furniture and cushions. Also the car! All the places I can use this! I love that it will also be like sterile clean! I am not a germaphob like my hubby thinks but I do like things as clean as I can get them. This is much better than all those chemicals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Showed up broken internal and could have easily started a fire.
reviews.reviewText: This item showed up with a broken line and after following directions to fill and start, steam started pouring out the sides instead of nozzle. The line you see is supposed to goto down into the tank.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great extra step or pre treatment - my kitchen feels super clean
reviews.reviewText: I used this in my kitchen the day after Christmas. It is terrific at getting sticky or greasy/ dusty things clean, but its not a miracle. It did nothing for the tiny bit of mildew around the base of my kitchen faucet, but it made cleaning the stove top, the oven and the microwave a breeze. It is very lightweight. I only filled it twice, and I spent a good half hour playing with it before my arm started to get tired and I was done for the day. It was cold in my kitchen, and the granite counters felt cold immediately after using, but I tested it on a cotton towel and it is indeed hot steam coming out. I really wanted to try it on my sliding glass doors, but I will have to wait for a much warmer day. I still needed to use soap and a sponge for most items, but this still cut down my cleaning time dramatically. And it was fun to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great for car detailing
reviews.reviewText: I got This little compact steamer for my trucks plastic interior and after market rubber floor mats. This worked like a charm to get all the nasty buildup of dirt and grime that didn't want to come off with simple soap and water scrubbing and red clay mud that seemed to stain the door and floor mat but this took it off with a breeze. Now my cars interior looks almost professionally done with this mini steamer. just be careful when starting up because it trickles water in the beginning as its heating up and I didn't get close to any electric switches or speaker housing due to fear of shorting them. All in all very satisfied with this small steamer.
